Exaggerate: The claim that Al Gore "invented" the Internet was an exaggerated distortion of his actual statement.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on altered wording and stripped context.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Al Gore was trying to take credit for the invention of the Internet, which is a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Al Gore was expressing his role in fostering the development of the Internet in an economic and legislative sense.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Al Gore never claimed to have invented the Internet.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by misrepresenting Al Gore's actual statement.
